title: Michelle Dee expresses thoughts on winning Miss World Philippines
text:
19 Sep – Michelle Dee recently took to social media to express her thoughts on her winning the Miss World Philippines pageant.

The model, who will be representing the Philippines in the upcoming Miss World pageant, shared a photo from her victory walk, writing, "A new chapter begins: I've just reached a major milestone in my life and all I can really say is Thank You. Thank you to everyone who's believed in me since the beginning."

"I don't think I'll ever be the perfect queen but I promise to try my best and to continue to do so everyday throughout my reign. I hope I make you all proud and I hope you all enjoyed the show last night too. HERE WE GO!" she added.

She also thanked her supporters for continuously expressing their encouragement for her, as well as the 39 girls who competed with her at the pageant.

"Getting to know a lot of you on a deeper level means so much to me. You guys have taught me so much throughout this journey and I really can't thank you all enough," she added.

Dee, who is also the daughter of Miss International 1979 Melanie Marquez, was crowned the new Miss World on 15 September at the event held at the Smart Araneta Coliseum.

Other winners include Kelley Day (Miss Eco Philippines), Isabelle de Leon (Miss Multinational Philippines) and Katrina Llegado (Reina Hispanoamericana).

(Photo Source: Michelle Dee Instagram)
description: The model doesn't think she's the perfect beauty queen but will work hard nevertheless
